segments.text: How was Mei ’ s party on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh I didn ’ t go . I stayed at home with my family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh really ? What did you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We watched lots of television and films .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we ate a delicious meal and drank some very good wine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it sounds like you really enjoyed yourself .
segments.speaker: S1
